document_name: Law No. 5902 on the establishment and duties of the Disaster and Emergency Management Authority
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUR/2009/TUR-2009-05-29-Law No. 5902 on the establishment and duties of the Disaster and Emergency Management Authority_3827f0607380ff3476abcd144b16d4ea.pdf
document_description: This law represents the overall framework for disaster risk management in Turkey. Its most important functions include requiring the government to establish a High Council on Disaster and Emergency in the office of the Prime Minister, or in a line ministry, in order to create disaster plans, programs, and reports, as well as assigning responsibility for implement emergency response, risk management, and risk assessment to the Department of Planning and Mitigation.
